item.title: WATCH: Part of high-rise apartment building collapses in New York City
item.description: An investigation is underway after an explosion in the Bronx caused part of a NYCHA apartment building to collapse on Wednesday morning.

item.title: WATCH: What does the government shutdown mean for you and your family?
item.description: ABC News' senior White House correspondent Selina Wang answers the most searched questions on the first day of the government shutdown.

item.title: WATCH: Fact-checking JD Vance's comments regarding government shutdown
item.description: ABC News' Katherine Faulders fact-checks the vice president's comments on the partisan divide hindering the passage of a funding deal.
